articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Sergei Mironov, leader of A Just Russia, on Dec. 26 last year.
					 The message said:
					
					 Dear Comrade Kim Jong Un,
					
					 Allow me to extend my sincere greetings to you on the forthcoming New Year.
					
					 The New Year is a symbol of hope linked with new future.
					
					 It is my expectation that the New Year will mark another fresh phase for you and the Korean people in the future development of the DPRK.
					
					 We highly appreciate the close relations based on confidence forged between our two parties and hope this constructive cooperation will go on.
					
					 We wish you good health, pleasure, happiness and welfare.
					
					 Please accept our highest regards.

articles.title: CPRK Lashes at Remarks of Chief for Diplomacy and Security of Chongwadae
articles.content:
CPRK Lashes at Remarks of Chief for Diplomacy and Security of Chongwadae 
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Sunday made public information bulletin No. 1018, blasting the recent remarks made by Chon Yong U, chief for diplomacy and security of Chongwadae justifying the confrontation policy pursued by traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					 Chon, when interviewed by Munhwa Ilbo, ultra-right conservative paper, on Dec. 27 last year, blustered that "south Korea's principled policy toward the north brought about an essential change in the framework of south-north relations", "there were clashes and casualties in the course of restoring the forces for deterring the north" but "it helped take back the right to decide peace on the Korean Peninsula," "peace should not be bought by paying money to the north" and "the north made him a hard-liner."
					
					 He raved that the present confrontation policy would be carried forward, jabbering that he is not "concerned much about the next regime's policy towards the north", "there is nothing fundamentally different from the present regime though the former advocated confidence and the like" and "the basic philosophy remains the same". 
					
					 The reckless remarks made by Chon who styles himself an architect of the "policy toward the north" in Chongwadae and a supervisor of its implementation betray the wicked true colors of traitor Lee, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 As far as Chon is concerned, he is a typical lackey who has played the role of servant for foreign forces' colonial domination and interference, working for years in the diplomatic field of south Korea.  After since he came to the liking of sycophant Lee, Chon has taken the lead in pursuing confrontation with compatriots at Chongwadae.
					
					 Not content with spreading the rumor about "the collapse of the north," he committed such high treason as malignantly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system. He is a good-for-nothing as he took an active part in fabricating "the north wind" which calls for confrontation with the DPRK during the south Korean puppet presidential election.
					
					 Chon, steeped in the bad habit and antipathy towards compatriots to the marrow of his bones, can never change his inveterate disposition.
					
					 What Chon uttered is no more than a foolish trick to help the Lee group improve even a bit its deplorable position in which it is badly beaten at home and abroad, and give a shot in the arm of the new ruling quarters who try to keep distance from it.
					
					 No one pays heed to the sophism made by human rejects that are accustomed to turn back the wheel of history by making a profound confusion of every phenomenon.
					
					 This reckless move would only precipitate the miserable end of the group of traitors.
					
					 Chon is bound to face the same stern punishment by the public as Lee would do.

articles.title: Chinese Government Economic and Trade Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Chinese Government Economic and Trade Delegation Arrives
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- A Chinese government economic and trade delegation headed by Li Jinzao, vice-minister of Commerce of China, arrived here on Monday to attend the seventh meeting of the inter-governmental committee for cooperation in economy, trade and science and technology between the DPRK and China.

articles.title: Delegation of Google Corp. of U.S. Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Google Corp. of U.S. Arrives
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Google Corp. of the U.S. headed by Bill Richardson, former governor of New Mexico State, arrived here on Monday by air.

articles.title: Provincial Mass Rallies Vow to Implement Tasks Set Forth in New Year Address
articles.content:
Provincial Mass Rallies Vow to Implement Tasks Set Forth in New Year Address
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- There took place Sunday mass rallies in different provinces of the DPRK to carry out the important tasks set forth by the dear respected Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address. They included South and North Phyongan, Jagang, South and North Hwanghae, Kangwon, South and North Hamgyong provinces.
					 Present there were officials of local party and power organs, working people's organizations and other people.
					
					 Speeches followed reports at the rallies.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as important guidelines which indicate a path of the great Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea, and a banner which calls upon all the army and people to turn out in the general advance to open up a turning phase for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 They called on all the officials and other people to wage the general offensive to bring about a radical turn in the building of an economic giant and the improvement of the people's living standard, bearing in mind the far-reaching plan of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They underscored the need to turn the every nook and corner of the country including streets and villages into a socialist land of bliss and build more modern cultural and welfare establishments, parks and pleasure grounds true to Kim Jong Un's plan of building a highly civilized socialist country and thus make the people lead a highly civilized life.
					
					 They called for waging dynamic struggle to glorify this year marking the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War as a year of great creation and innovation, full of confidence and optimism about sure victory.

articles.title: Meetings Held to Vow to Implement Tasks Set Forth in Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
Meetings Held to Vow to Implement Tasks Set Forth in Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in Ryanggang Province, Nampho City and Rason City on Monday to carry out the important tasks set forth in the historic New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 Present there were officials of local party and power organs and working people's organizations and other people.
					
					 Reports were followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporters and speakers stressed the need to bring about a new turn in building an economic power and improving people's living standard this year which marks the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victorious Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 They called for firmly upholding the socialist economic system of Korean style and improving economic guidance and management at the factories and enterprisers as required by the developing situation.
					
					 They underscored the need for the officials and other people in the field of agriculture to do farming well and raise the per-hectare yield of grain, true to the Party's policy of agricultural revolution.
					
					 They called for firmly establishing the spirit of giving importance to military affairs, sincerely assisting the People's Army, further consolidating the great unity between the army and the people and always maintaining a strained and mobilized posture so that they may wipe out the aggressors at a single blow.
					
					 They underlined the need to work hard to glorify this significant year as a year of great creations and changes which bring about a radical turn in building a thriving nation, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Youth and Women Pledge to Carry Out Tasks for This Year
articles.content:
Youth and Women Pledge to Carry Out Tasks for This Year
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Members of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea met on Monday to vow to thoroughly implement the historic tasks set forth by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Present there were officials concerned, officials of the youth league, youth and students and officials and members of the women's union.
					
					 At the rally held at the Youth Park Open-air Theatre in Pyongyang Chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league Jon Yong Nam made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the building of an economic power is the most important task for building a thriving socialist nation, calling upon the youth to make an all-out charge for increased production in every field and unit following the call made by the party.
					
					 Young people will actively join the Korean People's Army to firmly defend the country with arms, fully display the spirit of assisting the army and finally achieve the historic cause of the national reunification after defeating the aggressors at a blow if they dare provoke, they said.
					
					 At the rally at the plaza of the April 25 House of Culture Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the women's union, made a report. Some speeches were made after it.
					
					 The reporter and speaker said the New Year Address made by Kim Jong Un is important guidelines which brightly showed the way for eternal victory and prosperity of the great Paektusan nation and an inspiring banner to be held fast to by the Korean army and people.
					
					 They called on all the members and officials of the women's union to rally behind Kim Jong Un with a single mind and fully display the Korean women's resourcefulness and stamina in the struggle for the final victory of national reunification and building a thriving nation under his leadership.

articles.title: Poster Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Poster Exhibition Opens
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- A poster exhibition "Let us bring about a radical turn in the building of an economic giant with the same spirit and mettle as were displayed in conquering space!" was opened at the Pyongyang International Cultural Centre on Monday.
					 On display in the venue of the exhibition were 60 posters created by arts creators of the Mansudae Art Studio, Korean Central Fine Arts Studio, Fine Arts Studio of the Ministry of Railways and Pyongyang University of Fine Art.
					
					 Posters "Let Us Uphold the Party with Abilities like the Conquerors of the Space!" and "Fly Our Red Party Flag as Eternal Colors of Revolution!" reflect the strong will of the army and people of the DPRK to dynamically struggle for the final victory under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 "Let Us Make Innovations in the Fields of Coal-mining, Electric-Power and Metallurgical Industries and Rail Transport!", "Let Us Carry Out the Behests of the Great General, Holding Fast to Light Industry and Agriculture as the Major Fronts for Economic Construction!" and "Let Us Turn the Sepho Tableland into Large-scale Stockbreeding Base!" and other posters deal with tasks facing different sectors of the national economy to be carried out by the officials and working people this year.
					
					 Among the new posters are those on diverse themes such as "Let Us Make Mountains and Fields of the Country Greener with Warm Patriotism!" "Let Us Make the Universal 12-year Compulsory Education System Pay Off!" and "Let Us Turn Our Country into a Sports Power!".
					
					 Officials concerned, fine art creators and other people in Pyongyang looked round the venue of the exhibition.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Vow to Intensify Patriotic Activities for National Reunification
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Vow to Intensify Patriotic Activities for National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) released a statement on January 2 calling for thoroughly carrying out the tasks for national reunification put forward by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The New Year Address made by Kim Jong Un gives immense strength and courage to the overseas compatriots as he declared that the DPRK would advance straight along the path of independence, Songun and socialism to the end, under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 National reunification is the lifetime desire of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their behests and the supreme national task whose fulfillment brooks no further delay.
					
					 We will dynamically advance, keeping pace with patriotic activities for reunification of all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad from the standpoint of giving priority to the nation and attaching importance to it and achieving its unity, in hearty response to the call for opening a new phase of national reunification through a nationwide united patriotic struggle for reunification this year.
					
					 We will wage a dynamic struggle for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes for reunification common to the nation and milestones of peace and prosperity in the new century.
					
					  For national reunification it is necessary to decisively reject any foreign forces' moves for domination, intervention, aggression and war and never tolerate any act of hindering the country's reunification.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group in south Korea should give up at once the confrontation with the DPRK escalated from the outset of the year and opt for the national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 We are convinced that the day of reunification would surely come under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, concluded the statement.

articles.title: Chief of AINDF Mission Calls for Implementing North-South Joint Declarations
articles.content:
Chief of AINDF Mission Calls for Implementing North-South Joint Declarations 
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The vanguard fighters of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) will frustrate the war moves of the anti-reunification forces and dynamically turn out in the effort for thoroughly implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes for reunification common to the nation and a landmark for peace and prosperity in the new century. 
					 Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the AINDF, said this when interviewed by KCNA on Monday. 
					
					 The New Year Address made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un gives fresh strength and courage to the patriotic people in the south, he said, and continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Un declared in his New Year Address that what is important for putting an end to the division of the country and achieving its reunification is to defuse the confrontation between the north and the south. 
					
					 Upon listening to his historic address, all the fellow countrymen are dynamically turning out in the great advance for building a reunified and prosperous thriving nation in sky-high spirit full of hope and confidence. 
					
					 However, the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea has frantically kicked up confrontation rackets and stepped up war moves from the outset of the year, chilling the enthusiasm for national reunification. 
					
					 Such reckless moves of the rabid dogs are an open challenge to all Koreans hoping for the improved south-north relations greeting the New Year. 
					
					 The patriotic people in the south bitterly denounce the warmongers for bringing the danger of war, getting frantic with the confrontation with compatriots from the outset of the year. 
					
					 The reunification of the country is the greatest national task that brooks no further delay and long-cherished desire of the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 Victory in the cause of independent reunification of the country is sure to come thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Inspires DPRK Officials to Effect Economic Upsurge
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Inspires DPRK Officials to Effect Economic Upsurge
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The New Year address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un has greatly inspired the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in their efforts to consolidate the foundations for building an economic giant.
					 "Let us bring about a radical turn in the building of an economic giant with the same spirit and mettle as were displayed in conquering space!" -- this is what Kim Jong Un advanced in the New Year address as a slogan the Workers' Party and the people of Korea should uphold this year.
					
					 In this regard, Kim Han Il, vice-minister of Metal Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 "The New Year address has hardened my determination to devote myself to bringing about a radical turn in metal production.
					
					 I will do my best to carry into practice Marshal Kim Jong Un's intention to make the Korean people be well off."
					
					 Ri Ho Chol, vice-minister of Coal Industry, said:
					
					 "In the New Year address, Kim Jong Un said innovations should be made in coal industry to revitalize the nation's economy.
					
					 I will always find myself in coal mines to help boost coal output."

articles.title: Stage Art of DPRK Improved in 2012
articles.content:
Stage Art of DPRK Improved in 2012
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The stage art of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea made big strides in the year 2012.
					 The Moranbong Band made a debut in July, displaying the development of stage art in the country.
					
					 Comprising less than 20 instrumental and vocal musicians, its performance moved the people's heartstrings with refined rendition and emotional or cheerful vocal songs. The performance took a new aspect in all musical essences ranging from arrangements to instrumental techniques.
					
					 The band helped significantly celebrate holidays, including the anniversaries of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The Unhasu Orchestra, too, rose to fame with colorful performances given to mark the International Women's Day and the May Day.
					
					 The Mansudae Art Troupe and the Phibada Opera Troupe, well known at home and abroad, put on stages new numbers vibrant with the present-day spirit, greatly encouraging the people to effect fresh innovations in production and construction.
					
					 Last year witnessed the 500th performance of the light comedy "An Echo among the Hills", a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, and the 1500th performance of the revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl".
					
					 Meanwhile, the DPRK won top prizes at the 6th Valencia International Circus Festival and the 10th Wuhan International Acrobatics Festival.

articles.title: New Kind of Battery Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Battery Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Koryo Samhwa Joint Venture Company in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has succeeded in developing a new kind of air-tight battery.
					 This battery consumes 30 percent less electricity and it is 10 percent lower in production cost and twice longer in serviceable life, as compared with vitriolic electrolyte-based one.
					
					 It can be used for storage-battery car or as alternative power in locomotive, ship, power station and post office.
					
					 The car, powered by this battery, can run for eight hours at an average speed of 70 kilometers per hour and maximum speed of 180 kilometers per hour.
					
					 It can be applied even to 75-h.p. bulldozer.

articles.title: Art Performance Incites Desire for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Art Performance Incites Desire for Korea's Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Moranbong Band of the DPRK gave its New Year performance "Following the Party to the End" in Pyongyang.
					 The numbers of the performance included such songs as "Mts. Paektu and Halla Are of the Same Country" and "Reunification of Korea by Its Nation Itself", which stir up the desire for national reunification.
					
					 Ri Ok Se, vice-chairman of the Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation, told KCNA:
					
					 "The performance well showed all Koreans' will to build a reunified thriving country by concerted efforts of the entire nation.
					
					 The reunification of Korea is the supreme national task which brooks no further delay, and it is the lifelong desire and behest of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Deeply grieving over the national division, the Generalissimos had worked heart and soul all their life to hand down a reunified country to the posterity.
					
					 I will work hard to achieve the national reunification, true to the behests of the Generalissimos, who laid solid foundations for the independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the nation."
					
					 Ri O Song, an officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					 "Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA, stressed in his New Year address that what is important in putting an end to the division of the country and achieving its reunification is to remove confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 The history of inter-Korean relations shows that confrontation between fellow countrymen leads to nothing but war.
					
					 However, the Lee Myung Bak group of rats in south Korea has frantically kicked up a racket for confrontation with compatriots from the outset of the year.  Those fond of playing with fire are bound to perish in it.
					
					 We will do our utmost to defend the sovereignty more precious than our own lives and bring earlier the day of national reunification, the cherished desire of all Koreans."

articles.title: News Analyst on Japan's Fabrication of "Hansong Treaty"
articles.content:
News Analyst on Japan's Fabrication of "Hansong Treaty" 
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists forced the Korean feudal dynasty to adopt the "Hansong (Seoul) Treaty" on January 9, 128 years ago. 
					 The treaty was a document for aggression cooked up by the Japanese imperialists who bedeviled Korea-Japan relations in the wake of the failure of the Kapsin Coup in 1884, the first bourgeois reform in Korea. 
					
					 When the Kapsin Coup occurred, the Japanese imperialists pretended to support the bourgeois reform in Korea, but in fact they craftily worked to torpedo it. 
					
					 They calculated that in case the bourgeois reform succeeded in Korea, their plan for aggression might go bust. 
					
					 That was why, when the enlightenment forces of Korea succeeded in the Kapsin Coup in 1884, the Japanese imperialists broke the promise made with the forces and unilaterally withdrew Japanese soldiers who "were mobilized to guard" the royal palace. 
					
					 When infuriated citizens of Seoul encircled the Japanese legation and lodged a strong protest against their action, the Japanese resident minister set fire to the legation and ran away. He asked the Japanese government to dispatch armed forces to take "retaliatory measures". 
					
					 After deliberately creating a complicated situation surrounding the Korea-Japan relations with the Kapsin Coup as an occasion, the Japanese imperialists used this for pursuing their policy for invading Korea. 
					
					 They entered Inchon Port with 7 warships with troops of two battalions aboard. They forced the Korean feudal government to conclude a humiliating treaty, unreasonably claiming "reparation" for "damage" they suffered during the Kapsin Coup. 
					
					 The corrupt and incapable ruling quarters of the Korean feudal dynasty yielded to the threats and blackmail of the Japanese imperialists and concluded the above-said treaty on January 9, 1885.
					
					 By concluding the treaty the Japanese imperialists wrested a huge amount of "reparation" from Korea and provided conditions for subjugating Korea politically, economically and militarily. 
					
					 In the subsequent period, too, they fabricated different kinds of "treaties" including "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" in the same manner, turning Korea into their colony. 
					
					 All facts prove that their method of invading Korea was the most cunning, shameless and brigandish one. 
					
					 The outrageous moves for aggression perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists against Korea in the past are being invariably carried forward by the Japanese reactionaries at present. 
					
					 They are openly trying to grab by force of arms Tok Islets, inviolable territory of Korea, and put spurs to the arms race for aggression under the pretext of non-existent "threat".
					
					 Their moves are aimed at securing a pretext for justifying their moves for aggression by driving the relations between Korea and Japan to an extreme phase. But they are seriously mistaken. 
					
					 The Korean people are no longer what used to be in the past when their dignity and sovereignty were wantonly trampled upon by the Japanese imperialists' brigandish aggression. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should stop at once their reckless moves for reinvasion and make sincere apology and honest reparation for their crime-woven history.

articles.title: U.S. Reckless Hostile Policy towards DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Reckless Hostile Policy towards DPRK under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Defense Department recently decided to sell four Global Hawks, drone of high performance, to south Korea.
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary:
					
					 The arms sale is intended not only to gratify the greed of Northrope Graman, munitions monopoly linked with the U.S. Defense Department, but also to increase the ability of collecting information about the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. warlike forces' sinister intention is to prepare the south Korean warmongers and the Japanese reactionaries, who regard the confrontation with the DPRK as their mode of existence, as a shock brigade for realizing its hostile policy toward the DPRK and ignite a war against it.
					
					 The DPRK's political, military and economic potentials have shown substantial increase and its over-all might has been strikingly demonstrated in various fields.
					
					 The U.S. authorities are fearful of this and making desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK. The U.S. has put forward south Korea and its other allies to the forefront of escalating the confrontation with the DPRK and worked hard to realize the ambition to dominate the world while preventing a war on its mainland and minimizing damage to be inflicted upon it.
					
					 The U.S. ruling forces have pushed the confrontation with the DPRK to an extreme phase in a bid to render the situation on the Korean Peninsula seriously tense and create favorable conditions for realizing their ambition for dominating the Asia-Pacific region under this pretext.
					
					 Even though the U.S. persistently pursues reckless hostile policy toward the DPRK by instigating its allies, the U.S. will get nothing but unimaginable disaster.
					
					 The present era is different from that in the 1950s when the U.S. ignited the Korean war while ensuring the security of its mainland.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Rooting Out Lee Myung Bak Group of S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Rooting Out Lee Myung Bak Group of S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- All Koreans will eliminate the Lee Myung Bak group in south Korea, the root cause of misfortune, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article. 
					 The north-south relations which had made a dynamic advance under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration were driven to a catastrophic phase unprecedented in history under the rule of the Lee group, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 It is very disgusting that the Lee group branded as dregs of the times and politicians more dead than alive is getting frantic with confrontation with compatriots and moves for a war against the north, quite contrary to the aspiration of the nation and the trend of the times. 
					
					 The madcap military provocations being perpetrated by the south Korean warmongers from the outset of the year are reckless actions which could be committed only by those keen to ignite a war. 
					
					 The prevailing situation clearly indicates that south Korean people can escape calamities only when the Lee group is rooted out. 
					
					 All Koreans should resolutely frustrate any move to escalate the confrontation which leads to a war by concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 Any intrusion into territorial waters of the DPRK under the pretext of defending the illegal "northern limit line" and any anti-DPRK psychological warfare including kindling of the light atop Aegibong and scattering of leaflets will be frustrated by the prompt counter-attack by all the service personnel and people of the DPRK and the group of traitors is fated to go to ruin.

articles.title: Disgusting Behavior of Political Servant Ridiculed
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules Disgusting Behavior of Political Servant 
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Chon Yong U, chief for diplomacy and security of Chongwadae, recently made remarks justifying the confrontation policy pursued by traitor Lee Myung Bak when recently interviewed by Munhwa Ilbo, ultra-right conservative paper.
					 He claimed that "south Korea's principled policy toward the north brought about an essential change in the framework of south-north relations" and "there were clashes and casualties in the course of restoring the forces for deterring the north but it helped take back the decision-making right for peace on the Korean Peninsula."
					
					 Even stone Buddha will blush at Chon's disgraceful remarks.
					
					 He must be a congenital idiot judging from his remarks though he is about to be sidelined from power being censured internally and externally.
					
					 Chongwadae consists of a bunch of politically-blinded and half-witted persons like Chon who are unable to face up to the situation and public mind-set. How can a proper policy be expected in south Korea.
					
					 This guy has gone so brazen-faced as to say that "the north made him a hard-liner." He reminds one of an ugly guy scolding the mirror for reflecting his uncomely face.
					
					 He called himself a VIP emerging in the conservative political circle. How pitiful he is.
					
					 We have never regarded him as a member of a moderate group or a sound guy.
					
					 Chon is no more than an old stooge who has taken the lead in inventing and carrying out the policy for confrontation with the DPRK in the south Korean diplomatic circle which is ill famed for humiliating diplomacy.
					
					 When he was the chief of the room for diplomacy and information policy in south Korea in May 2005, he played a key role in the nuclear racket of his master against the DPRK. He used to bluster that "the nuclear issue of the north is a threat which is intolerable for the world peace and security".
					
					 He also made such nonsense that the north must take sincere attitude towards the initial implementing measure proposed by the U.S. if it wants to have the sanctions lifted at the second round of the fifth six-party talks in Dec. 2006.
					
					 In June 2010 when he was the puppet vice-minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, he visited the U.S., his master, to beg it to refer the conspiratorial "Cheonan" warship sinking case to the UN Security Council session.
					
					 After he assumed the present post, he made such remarks that "the south-north dialogue is possible only when the north apologizes for the 'Cheonan' warship case and the Yonphyong Island shelling case and the denuclearization is realized".
					
					 He is also an extremely vicious element who committed such treachery as debasing the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system, not content with floating the story of "collapse of the north" last year.
					
					 As was disclosed by a U.S. diplomatic document, he cried out for prioritizing the U.S.-south Korea alliance and promoted introduction of the U.S. missiles and so on.
					
					 As shown by the above facts, he is just a hundred harms without a single benefit for the Koreans.
					
					 He deserves nickname "shallow brained fox" as he was so keen on the solicitation diplomacy being stooped to humiliation and shame.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak is using such Chon as a shield for saving his face now that he is completely isolated internally and externally with his policy for confrontation failed. How poor Lee is.
					
					 Lee must be a human reject as he is mad with continuing his confrontation policy which drove his group to the tight corner even though he is on his journey to the other world.
					
					 Clear is the end Chon is fated to.
					
					 He is destined to meet the severe punishment of the people just like Lee.

articles.title: British Organizations Welcome Institution of International Kim Jong Il Prize
articles.content:
British Organizations Welcome Institution of International Kim Jong Il Prize
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Dec. 26 last year to hail the institution of the International Kim Jong Il Prize.
					 The joint statement said that they warmly hailed the announcement of a decision on instituting the International Kim Jong Il Prize on December 24, 2012, the 21st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The institution of the prize is a manifestation of the deep reverence of progressive humankind and Juche idea and Songun idea followers for Kim Jong Il, who performed valuable feats for global cause of independence, the joint statement said, and went on:
					
					 He is held in respect by the revolutionary people across the world for the great ideological and theoretical feats he performed by developing the Juche idea.
					
					 He enjoyed undisputed trust from the broad popular masses aspiring after socialism as he remained true to the cause of socialism, holding high the banner of socialism.
					
					 His Songun politics enabled the DPRK to lead the confrontation with imperialism to victory and provided it with a powerful means for an anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 As a result, we the Juche idea and Songun idea followers have got great inspiration and courage from the news of the institution of the prize and determined to work harder to study and disseminate Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported in Brazil, Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported in Brazil, Peru
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un was hailed in Brazil and Peru. 
					 The Genuine Democratic Movement of Brazil said in a statement on Jan. 2 as follows:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un laid down a bright milestone for the DPRK in his New Year Address which guides the DPRK to prosperity and the people's well-being.
					
					 He put forward a slogan "Let us bring about a radical turn in the building of an economic giant with the same spirit and mettle as were displayed in conquering space!"
					
					 He called upon the Korean people to turn out in the struggle to make new year 2013 full of great creations and changes upholding this slogan in which a radical turnabout will be effected in the building of a thriving socialist country on the road of the onward march in the new century of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 We will positively support and encourage their struggle. 
					
					 We also support the New Year Address which called on all members of the Korean nation to subordinate and orientate everything to the great national cause of reunifying the country from the standpoint of giving priority and attaching importance to the nation and achieving its unity under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 Declaration, great reunification programmes common to the nation in the new century and milestones for peace and prosperity.
					
					 We vehemently denounce the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces for their policy against Korea's reunification and their ceaseless military provocations to the DPRK.
					
					 We appeal to the progressive political parties, organizations and figures to pay deep attention to the issue of Korea's reunification and extend support and solidarity to the Koreans in their struggle for the independent reunification of the country free from foreign interference.
					
					 The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute said in a joint statement on Jan. 1:
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address evinced his will to adhere to socialism and build an economic giant by invariably pursuing Songun politics, true to the intentions of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We fully support his address.
					
					 The Workers' Party and people of Korea will certainly achieve a final victory in their struggle for building a thriving socialist country and achieving national reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Launch Hailed by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Launch Hailed by Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted articles on the internet website on Dec. 22 last year hailing the DPRK's successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2.
					 An article entitled "Tribute to Generalissimos" said Kwangmyongsong 3-2 airs immortal revolutionary hymns "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il" to be heard on the earth. It went on:
					
					 The satellite launch fully reflects the highest tribute the dear respected Kim Jong Un and the Korean people pay to President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il.
					
					 One should view that such profound meaning is given by the fact that the satellite was launched in 2012, the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung and with the approach of the first anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il and that "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il" are heard from the satellite. 
					
					  Another article entitled "National power of the DPRK" said the DPRK's successful launch of the first application satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 fully demonstrated its national power once again.
					
					 Through its successful launch of the scientific and technological satellite the DPRK emerged a satellite manufacturer, launcher and possessor which has firmly attained the lifeline of space science and technology. In a word, the DPRK's national power has reached space.

articles.title: Romanian, Nepali Personages Wish Korean People Success in New Year
articles.content:
Romanian, Nepali Personages Wish Korean People Success in New Year
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Romanian and Nepalese personages visited the DPRK embassies in their countries on Jan. 1 and 2 on the occasion of the New Year 2013. They included Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, and vice-chairmen of the party, a member of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) and concurrently secretary of the Lalitpur District Committee, members of the district committee and heads of women and youth organizations.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before a large painting of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and their portraits at the embassies and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu said that 2012 was a historic year in which the Korean people fully demonstrated their will to accomplish the revolutionary cause started and developed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, holding him at the top posts of the party, state and army.
					
					 He expressed belief that upon receiving the New Year Address made by Kim Jong Un, the Korean people would win remarkable achievements in all fields in this year, too.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Romania will boost the relations with the Workers' Party of Korea and extend full support to the heroic Korean people in their struggle in the new year, too.
					
					 M.K. Chalise and other speakers said Kim Jong Un, possessed of outstanding leadership art and strong grit and pluck, tops the list of world political leaders. 
					
					 They hoped that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in their new year's drive to build an economic power and reunify the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Russian, Pakistani Personages Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Russian, Pakistani Personages Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions
						
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Russian and Pakistani personages paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries on Dec. 26 and 29 last year on the occasion of the first anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The first and second secretaries of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the general secretary of the Sind Provincial Committee of the Pakistan Awami National Party and his party laid floral baskets and bouquets before large paintings of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together before paying tribute to them.
					
					 They sincerely wished Kim Jong Un, who is reliably carrying forward the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, happiness in good health and success in carrying out the cause of building a thriving nation.
					
					 Johnny Hon, co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, He Zhiping, chief secretary of the China Hong Kong Zhonghwa Energy Fund Commission, and the general manager of the Gold Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., Hong Kong sent floral baskets to the DPRK mission in Hong Kong, China.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia confites a los ninos de todo el pais
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia confites a los ninos de todo el pais
						
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio confites a los alumnos de primaria y los ninos de jardines infantiles y guarderias de todo el pais.
					  Para los infantes que viven en las islas del Mar Oeste con acceso bloqueado debido a la capa de hielo, el tomo la medida de organizar vuelos para transportar las golosinas.
					
					  El dia 6, llegaron aviones a las islas So, Sok, Jamae, Su-un, Ga, Taehwa, Rap, Ae y Than.
					
					  Los padres de ninos y otros islenos expresaron agradecimiento al Mariscal diciendo que el es padre generoso quien se preocupa mas por los que viven en lugares apartados.
					
					  Los alumnos y ninos tomaron la firme decision de aprender con afan teniendo presente las benevolencias del Partido del Trabajo de Corea con la meta de formarse como futuros pilares de la Corea del Songun.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia a Chon Yong U que jusifica poliica conflitiva
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia a Chon Yong U que jusifica poliica conflitiva
						
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica la informacion no.1018 en relacion con que el jefe de diplomacia y seguridad de Chongwadae Chon Yong U justifico a traves de los medios de prensa la politica de confrontacion del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak.
					Chon, en una entrevista con el medio ultraderechista y conservador Munhwa Ilbo sostenida el 27 de diciembre pasado, dijo que "la politica de principios sobre el Norte hizo cambiar esencialmente el esquema de las relaciones Sur-Norte", "aunque hubo conflictos y las perdidas humanas en el proceso de recuperar el disuasivo sobre el Norte, obtuvo el derecho a decidir la paz de la Peninsula Coreana", "no debe comprar la paz entregando el dinero al Norte" y "el Norte me convirtio en persona intransigente".
					
					Ademas, apunto que no cambiara radicalmente la "politica sobre el Norte" del proximo "poder" y es igual la filosofia fundamental de este que continuara su politica conflictiva.
					
					Sus palabras representan tal como son la siniestra intencion del traidor Lee Myung Bak, senalala nota y prosigue:
					
					Chon es el tipico lacayo quien al trabajar durante largo tiempo en el circulo diplomatico del gobierno titere sirvio a las fuerzas extranjeras en practicar la dominacion colonial sobre el Sur de Corea e intervencion en sus asuntos internos y el elemento recalcitrante  que puso en la delantera de la confrontacion fratricida en Chongwadae durante el mandato de Lee.
					
					El difundio el "rumor de derrumbe del Norte", denigro la maxima dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC y durante el tiempo de las elecciones presidenciales invento el "oleaje anti-Norte" para crear el ambiente del enfrentamiento anti-RPDC.
					
					Los disparates de Chon no pasan de ser una vil artimana de mantener la honra manchada del traidor Lee y ejercer la presion a las fuerzas del nuevo poder que tratan de mostrar la "diferenciacion" con el anterior.
					
					Nadie prestara atencion a los disparates de basuras humanas como Chon.
					
					Tales actos adelantaran solo el fin tragico de la banda de los traidores.
					
					Chon debe sentarse junto con el traidor Lee Myung Bak en el banquillo de acusados de la opinion publica.

articles.title: Continuan mitines para materializar tareas presentadas en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Continuan mitines para materializar tareas presentadas en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar este lunes en la provincia de Ryanggang y las ciudades de Nampho y Rason los mitines para materializar las tareas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el mensaje del nuevo ano  con la participacion de los funcionarios de las instituciones locales del partido, el poder y las entidades de masas y otros trabajadores. 
					En los actos hubo informes y discursos. 
					
					Los oradores mencionaron la necesidad de registrar nuevos cambios en la construccion de la potencia economica y en el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo este ano en que se celebraran el 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					
					Las fabricas y empresas han de mantener con firmeza el sistema economico socialista al estilo coreano y mejorar la direccion y la administracion economicas de acuerdo con la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo, enfatizaron.
					
					Los funcionarios y trabajadores agricolas deben cultivar bien la tierra para aumentar el rendimiento por hectarea segun la orientacion del Partido de hacer la revolucion en la agricultura, dijeron. 
					
					Es preciso establecer el ambiente de dar importancia a los asuntos militares, brindar el apoyo sincero al ejercito popular, consolidar la unidad entre el ejercito y el pueblo y mantenerse siempre en el estado de alerta para poder aniquilar de un golpe a los invasores, puntualizaron. 
					
					Por ultimo, exhortaron a apoyar con fidelidad la orientacion del Mariscal y empenarse por hacer de 2013 de un ano de grandes innovaciones y creaciones en abrir la coyuntura de viraje en la construccion de un Estado prospero.

articles.title: Actos de juramento de jovenes y mujeres
articles.content:
Actos de juramento de jovenes y mujeres 
						
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar este lunes los actos de juramento de los vanguardistas juveniles y las miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea (UMDC) para materializar las tareas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					Asistieron a las ocasiones los cuadros correspondientes, los funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud socialista Kim Il Sung, los jovenes y estudiantes, las funcionarias y otras miembros de la UMDC.
					
					En el acto de la juventud realizado en el Teatro al Aire Libre del Parque Juventud el presidente del CC de la UJS Jon Yong Nam, presento el informe y otros intervinieron. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que la construccion de la potencia economica es la tarea mas importante que se presenta en la actualidad en el cumplimiento de la causa de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, y llamaron a todos los jovenes a librar la ofensiva general para registrar el auge productivo en todas las esferas y unidades en respuesta al llamamiento combativo del Partido. 
					
					Los jovenes coreanos se alistaran al ejercito popular para defender la patria con las armas, pondran de pleno manifiesto el ambiente de apoyo al ejercito, aniquilaran de un golpe a los invasores y lograran sin falta la historica causa de la reunificacion de la patria, enfatizaron. 
					
					El acto de las integrantes de UMDC se realizo en la explanada frente a la Casa Cultura 25 de Abril. 
					
					La presidenta del CC de la UMDC, Ro Song Sil presento el informe y otras hicieron uso de la palabra. 
					
					Las oradoras dijeron que el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal es la guia programatica que ilumina claramente la via de victorias y prosperidad de la potencia del monte Paektu y sirve de la bandera combativa a ser mantenida por los militares y civiles coreanos. 
					
					Exhortaron a todas las integrantes y funcionarias de la UMDC a unirse monoliticamente en torno al Mariscal bajo su direccion y exaltar la inteligencia y el impetu de las mujeres coreanas en la lucha por lograr la reunificacion de la patria y el triunfo final de la causa de construccion de un Estado prospero.
